name: Apocalypt - Choose your own story
description:
Apocalypt - Choose your own story is an adventure game where you can change the way of the story going. The place where the game happens is in an apocalyptic word after a zombie breakout! It was created for:

My First Game Jam: Winter 2021

Thank you for playing!

---UPDATE LOG---

10.01.2021

Added various post-processing effects.

Added Xbox Controller support.
